choiceresponse.p: What does the XGROUP DELCONSUMER command do?
choiceresponse.label: Choose two answers:

checkboxgroup.choice: Deletes a consumer from a group
Deletes the consumer's list of pending entries
Sets the last delivered ID of the group to one before the deleted consumer's first pending message.
Deletes all consumers for a given consumer group

div.p: Deleting a consumer with the XGROUP DELCONSUMER command will delete both the consumer and its list of pending entries, but does not affect the overall read position of the consumer group in the stream.
